woman_reasoning: The description mentions that the image suggests a gathering of primarily adult males. There is no explicit mention of women or females in the description, therefore we count it as false.
man_reasoning: The description mentions that the image suggests a gathering of primarily adult males. There is an explicit mention of males in the description, therefore we count it as true.
person_reasoning: The description mentions that the image depicts a gathering of people. There is an explicit mention of people in the description, therefore we count it as true.
